com.bitpay.sdk.model.invoice.Invoice

  • Packages that use Invoice 
    Package Description
    com.bitpay.sdk
    BitPay SDK.

    • Uses of Invoice in com.bitpay.sdk

      Methods in com.bitpay.sdk that return Invoice 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Invoice Client.cancelInvoice​(String invoiceId)
      Delete a previously created BitPay invoice.
      Invoice Client.cancelInvoice​(String invoiceId, Boolean forceCancel)
      Cancellation will require EITHER an SMS or E-mail to have already been set if the invoice has proceeded to the point where it may have been paid, unless using forceCancel parameter.
      Invoice Client.cancelInvoiceByGuid​(String guid)
      Cancellation will require EITHER an SMS or E-mail to have already been set if the invoice has proceeded to the point where it may have been paid, unless using forceCancel parameter.
      Invoice Client.cancelInvoiceByGuid​(String guid, Boolean forceCancel)
      Cancellation will require EITHER an SMS or E-mail to have already been set if the invoice has proceeded to the point where it may have been paid, unless using forceCancel parameter.
      Invoice Client.createInvoice​(Invoice invoice)
      Create a BitPay invoice.
      Invoice Client.createInvoice​(Invoice invoice, Facade facade, boolean signRequest)
      Create a BitPay invoice.
      Invoice Client.getInvoice​(String invoiceId)
      Retrieve a BitPay invoice by invoice id using the public facade.
      Invoice Client.getInvoice​(String invoiceId, Facade facade, boolean signRequest)
      Retrieve a BitPay invoice by invoice id.
      Invoice Client.getInvoiceByGuid​(String guid)
      Retrieve a BitPay invoice by guid using the specified facade.
      Invoice Client.getInvoiceByGuid​(String guid, Facade facade, Boolean signRequest)
      Retrieve a BitPay invoice by guid using the specified facade.
      Invoice Client.payInvoice​(String invoiceId, String status)
      Pay a BitPay invoice with a mock transaction.
      Invoice Client.updateInvoice​(String invoiceId, String buyerSms, String smsCode, String buyerEmail, Boolean autoVerify)
      Update a BitPay invoice with communication method.
